Erin & Dan

Chicago, IL

2016

We are thrilled to announce our wedding. Please join us on September 17th for an evening of celebration, family, old friends, strong drinks, and dancing. We can't wait to see you there.

Reception

We’re pumped to spend an evening with all of our favorite people. We’ll have food to eat, drinks to drinks, great company, and good music to dance to. There may even be a speech or two.

Join us for dinner, drinks, and plenty of dancing.

Traveling to Chicago

We spent the bulk of our twenties living in and learning to love the great city of Chicago. Many of our family and friends live right down the road, but if you’re joining us from out of town, we’d love to make a few suggestions for what to do and see while you’re here.

Lodging

We’ve lined up a small block of rooms at Spring Hill Suites on the Northwest side. Reserve a room by August 17th to get your spot.

Reserve a room

If you’d rather soak up a little more local flavor, we highly recommend checking out AirBnB.

Chicago AirBnB

We’re pulling together a fun list of places to see while you’re in town, including our favorite food, drink, and sights throughout Chicago. Check back soon!

RSVP

In order to save everyone a trip to the post office, we will be collecting RSVPs electronically. Before you fill out the form below, please note:

  • We are having a smaller, more intimate ceremony on Friday, September 16th and, unfortunately, are not able to invite as many people as we will for the reception on Saturday. Please check your invitation if you’re not sure which to attend. And get a hold of us if you’re still not sure!
  • We would love to know if you will be joining us by September 5th.
